description:
There`s a spoilsport in Bubble Town`s robot-kite flying contest: jealous Antonio, the new hovering Weather-Control Robot, who feels that the skies belong to him- and who`l defend his place with weather attacks on Cubix and the kids.
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: Combock, Arashi o Yobu Takoage Taikai Da!
コンボック, 嵐を呼ぶ凧上げ大会だ!
